gizmo.title: Page Anchor
gizmo.description: Link to specific points in a video on the page

configure.title: Page target
configure.description: ID or resource that the anchor relates the material to

configure.title: Deep link Value
configure.description: Value associated to the anchor, example: timestamp, slide id, etc.

configure.title: Site entity
configure.description: Optional Associated site entity. This allows the site to control the presentation of the related entity concept, taxonomy, etc. Otherwise color and icon defaults to the related item.
